modules.description: This module initializes and configures runtime monitoring for a unikernel, sending metrics via TCP to a specified IP and port using the InfluxDB wire protocol. It supports dynamic control of logging and metrics via a TCP control port and provides memory profiling through a dedicated TCP endpoint. It works with IP addresses, network stacks, and memory profiling data to enable remote monitoring and performance analysis.

This module initializes runtime monitoring for unikernels, sending metrics via TCP to a remote server using the InfluxDB wire protocol. It provides functions to define counter metrics, tag metrics with virtual machine names, and configure remote logging, metrics control, and memory profiling over TCP. Concrete use cases include tracking VM performance in production environments and enabling dynamic control of monitoring output.
